newsitem.title: ITALY: No plans to change bond tax levels - Italian FinMin
newsitem.headline: No plans to change bond tax levels - Italian FinMin

text.p: The Italian finance ministry said in a statement on Thursday it had no plans to amend taxation levels on government bond and bill holdings.

"The finance ministry and the Treasury categorically deny that special measures are being studied to introduce a (new) tax or modify fiscal treatment of state bonds," the finance ministry said in a statement.

The Italian media have reported recently that the government was thinking about increasing tax levels on bond interest earnings or introducing a new tax on bond holdings. -- Rome newsroom +396 6782501
